import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { FormControl, Validators} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} email = new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]) onSubmit() { this.router.navigateByUrl('/gallery') } }

Sign in to your account

Email is required.
Invalid email format.
